1.content: Alright, we'll start out simple. Boy or girl?
1.title: The choice of choices

12.content:
And why are they now foregoing toilets?

Option 1: As the result of a dare or bet.

Option 2: They've been cursed to be unable to use toilets.

Option 3: They've been thrust into a world where toilets don't exist.

Option 4: They just thought it would be fun
12.title: Girl

121.content:
At twelve years old, Louise had already established a reputation for herself within her small town. She was known far and wide as "the girl who never refused a dare", and this was completely true. No matter how outlandish or embarrassing, Louise refused to turn down any dare whatsoever. Well, as long as it was physically possible, anyway.

Which brings us to the present day, as a few of the girl's friends tried to find a dare she wouldn't do. It was going exceptionally poorly.

"I can't believe you really ate seven bean burritos..." her friend Kris complained. "How does your stomach even work...?"

Her other friend, Anthony, had a contemplative look on his face. "Aha! I think I've got something that'll be too much, even for her! Louise, I dare you to stop using the toilet from now on!"

Kris gave him a weird look. "Um, she's still human. She can't just stop her bodily functions."

"I'm not asking her to." He replied. "She can still... do her business, anywhere but the toilet."

"You're on." The response from the until-now quiet Louise startled the both of them. "Wait, really?" the two asked simultaneously.

Louise just nodded. Even if it was gross, a dare was a dare.
121.title: Dare/Bet

1211.content:
"Good timing actually" Louise smirked. "those bean burritos go right through me, and now I no longer have to worry about finding a bathroom."

With that, she pulled down her shorts and panties and squatted down on the ground where she was standing.

"Wait, you're doing it right here?" Kris asked in disbelief.

"Sure, why not? He said anywhere, so it's most convenient to just stay where I am."

Kris's follow-up statement about privacy was cut off by a grunt and a loud fart as Louise started to do her business. Kris and Anthony found themselves unable to look away as their petite friend dropped the largest, goopiest load either of them had ever seen.

Louise gave a genuine smile as she pulled her pants back up. "Much better. I think I like this dare. In fact..." A mischievous smirk worked its way onto her lips. "I dare you guys to join me."
1211.title: Get started now

info.brief_description: Who needs a toilet when you can just go wherever you want?
info.description:
This is the tale of those who, for one reason or another, have chosen to forego toilets and instead pee and poop freely wherever they happen to be, whether by choice or not. Fanfiction options are also possible.

Just a few guidelines:
- No sexual activity
- No Shrinking/growth, tf, vore, etc. i.e. keep the story focused.

That's about it, honestly. Enter if you dare.
